column5: Enter 'campaignBuilder' in the first row, 'email' in the second row. Then enter 'mail' in the third row and only 'email' should be displayed in autocomplete hint.

Check that user do not receive daily digest if 'Send me a daily digest of activity on my posts' option is disabled

Check that user do not receive email notifications about chat messages if 'When someone sends me a private message' option is disabled

Check that user do not receive email notifications about new comments if 'When my post gets a new comment' option is disabled

Check that user do not receive email notifications about new likes if 'When someone likes my content' option is disabled

Check that user do not receive email notifications about new mentions if 'When someone mentions me' option is disabled

Check that user do not receive email notifications about Koding updates if 'When Koding has member updates' option is disabled
